title: India a key market; committed to playing big role in digital revolution here: Google India MD
description: India MD Roma Datta Chobey said that Google is closely working with Indian start up ecosystem, and asserted that India has been and will remain an important market for the company.
content: Google sees India as "a very important market" both from users and research and development perspectives, India MD Roma Datta Chobey said on Thursday asserting that the global tech giant is geared up and fully committed to playing a significant role in India's digital revolution.
cleaned_content: google sees india as a very important market both from users and research and development perspectives india md roma datta chobey said on thursday asserting that the global tech giant is geared up and fully committed to playing a significant role in indias digital revolution
